correctness.rationale: The extraction contains numerous untraceable values, internal inconsistencies, and schema violations. Key issues: (1) Unsupported/guessed parameters: pressure (0.1 mTorr), carrierGas/purgingGas (N2), dosingTime, purgeTime, flowRates, growthPerCycle, saturation, nucleationPeriod, optical refractive index/absorption/band gap, electrical resistivity/carrier density/mobility (Hall), uniformity, conformality, roughness, film density, onOffRatio, and safety are not reported in the article. (2) Inconsistencies: supercycleDesign set to 1:2:2 (Comp. B) while deviceProperties correspond to Comp. C (ITO) with μ_FE = 36.9 cm^2/(V·s) and V_TH = −2.51 V; bandGap set to 3.5 eV (Comp. A-like) mismatches Comp. C. (3) Incorrect device structure: reported as Bottom-gate top-contact; article states top-gate bottom-contact. (4) Subthreshold swing magnitude/unit error and QUDT mismatch: article SS ≈ 0.20 V/dec; schema unit requires mV, so it should be 200 mV, but extraction uses 0.2 mV (1000× too small). (5) Film composition misreported: atomicRatio given as 1:2:2 (a subcycle ratio) instead of measured XPS cationic ratios (e.g., for Comp. C: In:Ga:Zn = 1.0:0.7:1.5; at.% In 14, Ga 9, Zn 21, O 56). ElementalConcentration is a single 20% value without element attribution, not traceable. (6) Schema violations: plasmaPower is set to null (should be omitted if not used); absorptionCoefficient unit PER-CENTI-M is not allowed by the schema (expects UNITLESS); many numeric fields are fabricated, violating schema’s traceability requirement. (7) Supercycle design lacks explicit mapping to the three compositions (0:2:2, 1:2:2, 2:2:2) discussed in the paper; only one process is given but mixes parameters from different compositions. Corrections needed: align supercycleDesign with the chosen composition or adjust deviceProperties accordingly; fix deviceStructure to top-gate bottom-contact; correct SS to 200 mV; replace filmComposition with the article’s XPS values and ratios; remove or leave unspecified all unreported process/material parameters (pressure, gas types, timings, flows, GPC, saturation, nucleationPeriod, optical/electrical film properties, uniformity, conformality, roughness, density, onOffRatio); remove plasmaPower if not PEALD; ensure all units comply with the schema.

completeness.rationale: Major incompleteness and schema issues. (1) Multiple ALD IGZO processes described in the article (three compositions via supercycle ratios 0:2:2, 1:2:2, 2:2:2; Comp. A, B, C) are reduced to a single process (effectively 1:2:2). Separate process objects for each composition (and their distinct supercycle designs and measured properties) are missing. (2) Supercycle design is incomplete/incorrect: only 1:2:2 is captured; 0:2:2 and 2:2:2 are absent; the subcycle sequence may vary per composition (Fig. 1c) but is not represented. (3) Device properties reported for six device sets (Dev. A, B, C with ITO; Dev. A′, B′, C′ with Mo) are collapsed to one set; most values are missing. Even the included values have errors: SS is given as 0.2 mV (should be ~0.20 V/dec ≈ 200 mV); deviceStructure is wrong (article: top-gate bottom-contact; extraction: bottom-gate top-contact). (4) Material properties are largely fabricated/not traceable: band gap method is REELS with values 3.51/3.23/3.10 eV per composition (extraction uses UV–Vis and a single 3.5 eV); refractive index, absorption coefficient, roughness, density, uniformity, and conformality are not reported in the article. (5) Film composition is incorrect: atomic ratio ‘1:2:2’ does not match XPS-determined ratios (e.g., Comp. B 1.0:1.1:2.3; Comp. A 1.0:2.8:5.4; Comp. C 1.0:0.7:1.5). (6) Process parameters contain ungrounded values (pressure, dosing/purge times, flow rates, GPC, nucleation period, carrier/purging gas), which are not provided in the paper; only temperature (200 °C), oxidant (O3), film thickness (20 nm), substrates (SiO2/Si), and precursors (TEIn, In–Ga bimetallic, DEZn) are traceable. (7) Schema compliance issues: plasmaPower is set to null (violates object type), thicknessControl nesting does not match the schema (numberofCycles/filmThickness placed under growthPerCycle), and SS units do not reflect V/dec as reported. To improve completeness, add three separate IGZO ALD processes (Comp. A/B/C) with correct supercycle counts and sequences, include the measured XPS compositions and REELS band gaps per composition, and for each corresponding device set (ITO and Mo) add the reported μ_FE, V_TH, and SS. Remove or mark as unknown any parameters not given (pressure, times, flows, GPC, uniformity/conformality, Hall properties), correct device structure and SS units, and align thicknessControl to the schema.
